homemadeIceCream.name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
homemadeIceCream.description: Vanilla based ice cream, large cookie dough chunks, and hint of butter flavor. Fresh out of the oven!

homemadeIceCream.description: Subtle lavender flavor with a swirl of all-natural honey.

sorbetsAndIces.name: Tropical Mango Sorbet
